segments.text: Do you think the music is well-matched ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I think the music is too fast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about the words of the song ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like it . Naturally it can arouse your feelings .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think so . It's very emotional .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , and I also like the rhythms .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really . It's worth listening to and enjoying .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly it is . It's worth an Academy Award .
segments.speaker: S2
